Topic Summary: Appeal against amended assessments for underpayment of tax arising from over-claiming of credit arising from Professional Services Withholding Tax "PSWT".
Tax Legislation: Section 526(2) of the Taxes Consolidation Act, 1997 ("TCA 1997");37. Section 528 of the TCA 1997; 38. Tax Briefing 22 of 1996;  39. Section 529A of the TCA 1997;
